          <title>
            <string language="en">Cementing of sediment layers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zementieren der Sedimentschichten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cimentage des couches de sédiment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cementing de camadas do sedimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cementazione degli strati del sedimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επένδυση με τσιμέντο των στρωμάτων ιζημάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cementación de las capas del sedimento</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the cementing of sediment layers to form sedimentary rocks.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">seas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sedimentary rocks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sediments</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt das Zementieren der 
Sedimentschichten zu den sedimentären Felsen des Formulars.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le cimentage des couches
de sédiment aux roches sédimentaires de forme.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra cementing de camadas do 
sedimento às rochas sedimentary do formulário.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la cementazione degli 
strati del sedimento alle roccie sedimentarie della forma.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την επένδυση με τσιμέντο 
των στρωμάτων ιζημάτων για να διαμορφώσει τους ιζηματώδεις 
βράχους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la cementación de las 
capas del sedimento a las rocas sedimentarias de la forma.</string>
          </description>
